price: Laylatul Qadri ni bora kuliko miezi elfu.
arabic: لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرٖ
footnotes: Usiku wa Qadr na Sharaf, Cheo na Utukufu, ni bora kuliko miezi elfu, kwa kuwa umekhusika kwa kuteremka ndani yake Qur'ani tukufu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: laylatu al-qadri khayrun min alfi shahrin
